wiki.summary: On “Ex Bitch,” XXXTENTACION reflects on lost love and a former relationship that wasn’t centered around love. In particular, he allegedly references girlfriend Geneva Ayala, whom he supposedly abused. The two were rumored to still not be on good terms prior to X’s death, although Geneva expressed remorse for X’s death on Twitter: "i don’t care if no one cared about me however many months ago, i didn’t lose my life. he did…it’s permanent. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: On “Ex Bitch,” XXXTENTACION reflects on lost love and a former relationship that wasn’t centered around love. In particular, he allegedly references girlfriend Geneva Ayala, whom he supposedly abused. The two were rumored to still not be on good terms prior to X’s death, although Geneva expressed remorse for X’s death on Twitter: "i don’t care if no one cared about me however many months ago, i didn’t lose my life. he did…it’s permanent. i’m still here. like how do you think that makes me feel?…everyone expecting me to be relieved or happy?! No, i’m broken" Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
